body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Hardware Haven customer support. My name is Dennis Walker. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Dennis. My name is Olivia Harris.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Olivia. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently purchased a hammer and a screwdriver from your store, but I'm very disappointed with the quality. The hammer's handle broke after just two uses.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Olivia. Could you please provide me with the receipt number and the date of purchase so I can look into this for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the receipt number is seven eight four two and the purchase was made on the third of February this year.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Olivia. I'll check our records and get back to you with a resolution. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, can you also let me know if there's a warranty for the tools I purchased? And how long is the warranty period?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Certainly, Olivia. Our tools come with a one-year warranty for manufacturing defects. I'll make a note of that as well. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time and for reaching out to us, Olivia. We value your feedback and we'll do our best to resolve the issue for you. Have a great day.
